author: Thad Vogler
description: Originally comprising just mezcal, pineapple and lime juice, depending on how ripe your pineapple you may want/need to add a spoon of agave syrup. And I also like to boost lime and pineapple complexity with a few drops of our Daiquiri Bitters.
name: Single Village Fix

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
